text:
I have the following simple test plan:

   Thread Group
         HTTP Request Defaults
         HTTP Request
         HTTP Request
         .... etc

I am trying to send HTTP requests to a non default port (eg 8080). 

If I specify the port in each individual HTTP Request it works fine.

However if I try and specify the port in the HTTP Request Defaults, 
and leave the port field blank in the individual HTTP Requests, the requests
ignore the default port and try to use port 80.

I would like to be able to use the same scripts on different deployed servers,
so changing the port in a single localtion in HTTP Request Defaults would be 
ideal.

Is this a bug, or am I trying to use HTTP Request Defaults incorrectly?

Thanks
Appears to have been fixed somewhere along the line.
